post:
Spearware Networks provides Web/Reseller and KVM powered VPS hosting at affordable prices in Tampa, FL, US.

Our Tampa location is excellent for Latin America based customers, with latency under 70 ms to Costa Rica!

We pride ourselves in providing prompt and professional support.

We only use enterprise grade Dell PowerEdge/HP ProLiant servers and enterprise drives for all of our products to ensure reliability and stability and we own all of our hardware.

Have a question?: Drop us a message at sales[at]SpearwareNetworks.com and one of our friendly staff members will be glad to help!

50% all orders with promo code EASTER!

## Frequently Asked Questions

#### What can I use as a test IP?

Tampa, FL: 204.9.38.10
Tampa, FL Looking Glass: https://tpa-lg.as212647.net/

#### Do you own your hardware?

We do! We own all of our VPS nodes and host them in high security datacenters.


#### What CPUs do you use?
We use at least Xeon E5 series processors. 

#### What are your bandwidth providers?

Our current providers are Cogent, GTT, and Hurricane Electric.

#### Where are your servers located?

Our VPS are based out of beautiful Tampa, FL.

#### Do you provide refunds?

Yes, you are eligible for a refund if you cancel and request it during the first 30 days.

#### What kind of software is not allowed?

We do not allow virtual currency mining, gaming servers, or IRC servers to be run on our VPS. Please note, however, that this is not an exhaustive list and that you should check our Terms of Service or contact us if you have any questions about what is allowed.
